website_summaries.verdict: We appreciate the affordable price of this compact air purifier, as well as its compatibility with different types of filters.
pros: Filters particles as small as 2 microns
Accommodates a variety of Holmes filter types
cons: Difficult to remove interior dust buildup

customer_reviews.title: like that it has 3 settings
customer_reviews.text: Works well, like that it has 3 settings, mostly keep it on low, occasionally higher if there's smoke or a bad smell in my apartment. The photos show how much it grabbed over 3 months mostly on low setting.
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: I've had this 3 months. We turn it on ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this 3 months. We turn it on in my toddler's room when he's sleeping. At 4 am this morning his smoke alarm started going off - I went in there and the room was filled with smoke and a burning plastic smell, and it was coming from this unit. Don't know if it was the motor or what but I'm reading a lot of reviews now that say the same thing, with some saying that the motor actually caught fire. It seems to be a consistent and obviously dangerous problem.
customer_reviews.author: sarah sanford

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Air Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a old house and have to live in the basement due to disabilities. It's a very dusty basement. My EXPENSIVE old air purifier stopped working, so since money is tight I figured I'd try one of these. I'm am very pleased. On the high setting, you can see the dust from half (5-feet) the room away get picked up and sucker into the pad on th HIGH setting. Then after an hour a day, I put in on the low setting and it continues to keep the air around my sleeping area clean or dust and pollen, plus cat hair too!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mccay

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY! WILL CATCH ON FIRE!
customer_reviews.text: Please, please do not purchase this. I had it for a few days and after waking up not being able to breathe, I saw it was because of this!! It had black soot all over it and even got on our walls. The filter inside was all black and the unit smelled like burning plastic. Spend some extra money and get a better one please, do not put yourself or your family/pets at risk.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: please don't buy, it does nothing at all.
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your time. I bought this in spite of the reviews saying it didn't do anything, but turns out they're right. I had it running for 2 weeks straight on high, with the negative ions on. I decided to go check today if it's actually capturing anything bc my room still has dust and allergens and turns out... NOTHING. The filter still looked brand spanking new. Idk if it's supposed to take longer than that for it to be doing something it I doubt it. The only part that was dusty was the equipment itself??! So I'm returning it first thing tomorrow. A shame. I had hope.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Van De Cruize

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This does my first floor (~1,200 sq. ft) because I couldn't afford a bigger one. I LOVE this. Our older dog is getting his teeth removed in June, but until then his breath/teeth absolutely reek! The smell hits you right in the face every time you walk in the house...until I got this! The smell is still there, but only at about 25% what it was which is amazing for this unit that is supposed to be for a much smaller area. It is one of the best purchases I have ever made! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. I use the real HEPA filter and replace the filter once a year. I use it in the bedroom at night. I turn it on medium with the door closed for about an hour before bedtime and then leave it running on low all night with the door closed when I go to bed. It's great white noise for sleeping plus keeps the air nice and fresh for easy breathing from allergies. I do check the outer sponge pre filter every month or so, hand wash it and let it air dry when needed which I think helps the HEPA work better and last as long as it does. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LaLady20

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have bad allergies and got several of these small air freshener/cleaner/ionizers for my apartment and they seem to work fairly good when I use all 3 at the same time. Each unit is good for a smallish room or bedroom. I got 1 for the Living Room, home office and main bedroom. I may need a fourth one for dining room/kitchen....but for now, these 3 units [all same] is working just fine. Filters are pretty easy to clean. 4 stars....it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey 440Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Noisy little thing
customer_reviews.text: So this is loud. Not white noise. Not a hum. It's just loud. That said it also works. Maybe a girl can't have it all but I value it's efficiency over the noise. It's compact and great for bookshelf or desk setup. At this price, I win.
customer_reviews.author: Kia H

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Holmes product on the recommendation of a relative. We had just had new windows put in our house when the product arrived. It quickly cleaned the air and absorbed the extra dust. It was so easy to pull the front off and vacuum the filter! I love that I can run it on low for almost no noise or run it on high and still not be distracted by the noise level. I would not hesitate to buy this again for another room.
customer_reviews.author: SunshineState

customer_reviews.title: Great for adoption center, foster room & air/hair born diseases
customer_reviews.text: Used it in our petsmart adoption center. We had ringworm and it wouldn’t go away. Cats fur contained ringworm and the fur balls would float around the air. Therefore I came up with the idea of trying a hepa air purifier. I bought this as a donation and no more ring worm since! It has been 2 years since! We replace the filter and the adoption center always smells fresh. Best donation ever!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Little air purifier with a big difference!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few days now. I'm absolutely amazed how well it works for the use I needed. I have it in the room with the kitty litter box. Normally, I can smell the litter dust. (His litter box gets changed every day.) I have not noticed that smell anymore. I have also noticed the air seems more fresh and easier to breathe. I was recently diagnosed with several allergens and have been sleeping better since buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scorpio Moon Shine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo the top review on this item is what officially sold me on this particular purifier. If an item this small and of a decent price can hold up that many years, I'm in. My husband wanted one for next to his computer. It arrived quickly, and he had it plugged in and on within 2 minutes. Then he shut the door. An hour later maybe, we both walked back into the room and the smell of the air was literally indescribable. The smell was...addicting. it smelled..SO GOOD. So..fresh. It has been on since, doing its job. I will update and with pictures. We got the black. It is exactly as pictured/described.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Loud and white film
customer_reviews.text: I just returned the one I ordered, seemed like a great deal but was very loud and worst of all, left a white film all over our dresser. I was also worried about a fire since multiple reviews said that theirs melted/caught fire. I reccomend spending a little more for the next model up.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces and litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these, one atop each letterbox. They do a great job of catching fine dust, and you can spray air freshener into the opening to give a nice, temporary smell. A good way to extend the life of the pricey filters is to discard the "activated charcoal" filter and use a 12 by 4 inch vent filter, sold in packs of 12 at your favorite home improvement store. These filter finer than the charcoal filter and you simply toss them instead of washing them.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: No Good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have it for about half month. Don't see any differences in air quality.It is noisy.Still see a lot of dust in room, but almost no dust on fillers.
customer_reviews.author: glushin

customer_reviews.title: Great as a sleep fan !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, I bought it to replace my sleep fan. I read an article about how regular fans blow dust and particles in your face all night and how bad that is for allergies so I got this to have clean air blowing all night. I needed something that made enough noise to replace my other fan and this blows strong enough to make me happy. I love that it doesn't have a light. Also, it can sit horizontal or vertical...so you can turn it either way depending on where you want to aim the fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and a work horse!
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Holmes air cleaner over a long period of time. All are still working and they do a great job of air filtration and dust. I’ve either gifted them to friends/family and was lucky enough to find several at a thrift store. I get the universal filters and keep up on the filter change and the carbon filter cleaning. Odor control is mediocre - but didn’t get them for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Orme

customer_reviews.title: perfect for bedrooms to drowned out noise for better sleep!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one i have purchased,they have all been in perfect working order, i have order three because I love ours in our bedroom and purchased the other two for my kids rooms, they help drowned out any noises and i sleep so much better with it on..I am a light sleeper and used to wake up at every little noise, not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Wheelie Dealie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, even in larger rooms
customer_reviews.text: I love bringing this out when allergy season hits or wildfire smoke gets bad outside. This little machine works hard! I've been very impressed with how well it works. Easy to change filters, too. Overall a great buy. Place it in the room you use the most or in the center of your house--it'll definitely help.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Will keep you updated.
customer_reviews.text: Product box had a big hole in it & product was scratched. I bought one previously for my bedroom & loved it. Not sure why this one showed up with cosmetic damage. Have it running & we will see if it works. Starts off with a heavy plastic smell; will see if that dissipates. When paying for a new product you kind of expect it to show up in better condition. It almost feels like I paid full price for something that had been returned by someone else already. I had to give a star rating for my submission to be accepted, so I'm rating it based on my previous product purchase. Will keep you updated on its function.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella E McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Holmes HEPA Type Desktop Air Purifier, 3 Speeds plus Optional Ionizer, HAP242-NUC: I’ve had several of these over the years. I run it 24x7 in my 12x15 bedroom and it typically lasts about 10 years with filter cleaning or replacement every 6 months. It makes breathing easier and cuts down on the dust in the room. The best part is the multiple speed settings so that I can find a nice quiet setting. This latest one can even stand vertically or horizontally. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Husband

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, ionizer not real
customer_reviews.text: Ionizer as some others mentioned appears to be fake, no noticeable difference between sound of operation nor smell of air when it is on, now after just a month and a half the orange light no longer turns on. I bought this to keep animal hair and dust away from a pc in the same room, for that purpose it works well enough. I would not recommend it as a whole room air purifier, i have two germ guardian purifiers that were ~$100 each but absolutely night and day difference on level of filtering/fresh air scent.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great job stopping my husband's coughs!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our bedroom because my husband coughs all night long. He's not a smoker. I thought there must be something in the air or the bed to cause this. Ran the filter the first night and he was somewhat better. Ran it all day and the next night and no coughing! Now I leave it running constantly unless watching TV in the bedroom as it is a little loud even on low. But makes for good white noise on high while sleeping. Great product. Thanks for keeping my husband quiet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G.

customer_reviews.title: Good air purifier
customer_reviews.text: Having COPD and asthma I have this in my room. Because of the COPD I cannot use the ionizer. So don't know anything about that. It does help with my COPD and asthma. I noticed a difference in sleep when I hooked this unit up. I don't know about odor elimination. I still smell my coffee brewing the kitchen and food cooking... no one smokes in the house. Items that have a strong scent are few and far between in my home. I can't really answer about odor elimination. I just feel the air is cleaner and it is easier for me to breathe.
customer_reviews.author: Prime user Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: longevity
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Holmes air purifiers that have continued to function without fail for over twenty years continuously.This model is only slightly cosmetically different and uses the same filters.Neither of the two I used for twenty years failed only they were white and looked dingy after that length of time.I hope this lasts half as long I will be elated.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated, air quality in room is improved.
customer_reviews.text: The seller packed the item very well, and it arrived much quicker than stated date of arrival : shipment took only 3 days, not 5 to 10. This Holmes small room air purifier works very well in the small rooms of the home. It's compact, so it doesn't take up much room. The lowest setting is very quiet, never a noise problem. There's no 'new electronics' smell from the machine. I'm using it to refresh the air in an old home with small windows. In the winter, with the heater running and windows shut, rooms tend to smell musty. The Holmes purifier solves this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Prof.  Anton

customer_reviews.title: I love this air purifier
customer_reviews.text: I love this air purifier. It doubles as white noise for me as well. I definitely notice a difference in the air quality when I use it. I turned it off for a weekend when I was away and as soon as I powered it back on I noticed the air quality improve. I have asthma and allergies to pets (my roommate has a cat and a dog, but they’re not allowed in my room.) This product has definitely cause an improvement for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This is my second one so.....
customer_reviews.text: It's the second one I've purchased so, I must love it. My room feels and smells better. My plant is even growing more in the clean air. I'm going to purchase another one for my office. The only thing I don't like is the noise level when it's on high when I'm trying to sleep but I solved the problem. When I'm sleeping I set it to low. Problem solved. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Urekasgold

customer_reviews.title: Great value and odor elimination
customer_reviews.text: Great purifier for price. I use this with the odor eliminating filter and it works very well. I have it in a spare bedroom where we keep our rat cage. The rodent smell has been completely eliminated. I run this 24/7 and have had it for a couple of months. No issues so far. I do wish it were quieter, but at least it produces a nice white noise so it is not annoying. It's worth the trade off in my opinion to get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Menew99

customer_reviews.title: Great Purifier
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for months now, and it has worked flawlessly. It definitely removes odors. The first few days, it left this very subtle smell of (plants? Nature?) any time it was turned on, but it seems as though everyone in the house, including myself, got used to it, because nobody can smell it anymore. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Flippy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My son was developing allergies and his room is not vented very well. I have another type of machine for another room and decided to try thus one as additional unit. Within 2 days of use - I had to get new filters! It cleaned the air in his room so fast! Definitely purchasing another! It is noisy on high speed - but he sleeps to white noise so it's petfect!
customer_reviews.author: mme

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a while
customer_reviews.text: So a difference was felt the next day... but fast forward to about 3 weeks plus later of use... plugged it in n then after a minute it stops... won't start again🙄
customer_reviews.author: Drene

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine and price !
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've owned, first lasted about 5 years and did a descent job cleaning the air. Built the same as the first, this little guy does a good job in a moderate size room not exceeding 90 sq. ft. it's a little noisy on second and third but very quiet on one. which is nice when sleeping. I'm a smoker and helps eliminate odor plus the dust thanks to the HEPA filter. The price is right for this product....
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Started burning
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 2 years in my daughter’s room. Was working great until this morning I turned it off, and it started back up on its own in the off setting and started to smell like it was burning.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary N Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Have three at our house and given two as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: While cleaning the air we breath is of course a good thing, the biggest reason we use these is to create white noise that blocks outside disturbances and allows a better night sleep. This even worked well for my father-in-law when he was staying in a rehab facility. There was so much noise in the hall outside his door at all hours that he hadn't been sleeping. After I got him this air purifier, the white noise from it allowed him to rest undisturbed.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.C.

customer_reviews.title: use 2 in our home and people say what ever we are doing to help it not stink is good. have bought others and they arent worth th
customer_reviews.text: we are smokers and wouldn't have any other machine,use 2 in our home and people say what ever we are doing to help it not stink is good. have bought others and they arent worth the money.these are the best weve used them for over 8 years
customer_reviews.author: Lynette G. story

customer_reviews.title: Best purifier out there
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this purifier! I have the grey one for my daughter’s room, and have had it for her since the day she was born, she is now 3. It is the perfect amount of white noise that helps her sleep through the entire night and cleans the air while doing so. I just purchased the black one for my soon to be born son. I can’t say enough about these!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: Works great has a nice low level sound too
customer_reviews.text: Works great has a nice low level sound too. Nice for sleeping. Clears the air of odor and refreshens the room, Great for a room that does not get a lot of ventilation. I use it in the summer bc I have allergies and it really cuts down my allergies a lot. I use it to freshen the room during the day too so it keeps the room fresh.
customer_reviews.author: JBlueSky

customer_reviews.title: Fixed by allergies.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat in my room with a cat post so lots of cat dander, I thought I had allergies but once I turned this on within 24 hours all of my symptoms went away. I would highly recommend. It is kind of loud but I sleep with a sound machine so I just use it as the sound machine. I do run it 24/7 and change filter every month.
customer_reviews.author: cynthiaa

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: I used to wake up every single night with a cough. It drove me crazy! I got the idea to buy an air purifier and after about 3 days of using it, I don't wake up anymore!! My house is pretty dusty (which in itself drives me crazy!) so I figured that's what was always making me cough! Because I ended up not coughing anymore, I bought a bigger air purifier for the house! I'm glad I purchased this! It was well worth the money! I also have noticed that my bedroom isn't as dusty as it used to be! So I'm sure that's what was waking me up!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Champlin

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this. I was hopeful, and I did not want to spend alot of money for one for our son's room. Can smell like a dorm or locker room in there from time to time. We got this on Friday and can honestly say after running it for 3 days - no weird smells. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. K.

customer_reviews.title: Allergies wrangled, odors eliminated
customer_reviews.text: I can tell a difference almost immediately. I have severe allergies and have had to remove all the carpet from my home and spend most of my weekends sneezing and snotty. I can tell the air is cleaner, I’m sleeping better and I haven’t had any sneezing or stuffy nose since I purchased two of these. I run them constantly and hardly notice they are running on the lowest setting. I wish I had found these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Devlebaba

customer_reviews.title: Small Purifier delivers Big!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purifier purchase, since the first one is such a dynamo. The white noise actually makes me sleep better. I use the Middle setting. The low setting is very quiet though. I recommend this for nurseries as well as any room in the house. This is a solid investment that will serve you for years!
customer_reviews.author: mamaj

customer_reviews.title: A must have item
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious must have item for health. I checked the filter at the recommended date and was shocked at how filthy the filter was. It was beyond nasty. It looked like tan mud. I bought this to get rid of dust. The dust brings dust mites, which causes you to have stuffy sinuses. They say during the winter, yucky things get trapped inside. I liked this purifier so much, I bought two of them. Altogether I have four air purifiers. I have the freshest air in the neighborhood (lol).
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, works great. Hoping it does not burst into flames like some of these other reviews state... I had a similar Holmes unit for years and never had a problem. They are loud on anything except the lowest setting. Id recommend not using the Ion feature. It will make dust stick to your walls, and I keep hearing it could cause health problems somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Tight seal between filter and housing.  Quiet operation, looks good.  Fine for medium rooms too.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Claritin filter system we had. This one is quiet and the seal around the filter is tight, so little escaped air. Noticeable difference in dust and allergy symptoms. We use this unit in a room larger than it's advertised for, so we don't get the full benefit, but we like the footprint and the cleaning is sufficient. I like that there are several filter choices for this too. The "permanent" HEPA filters that some companies sell with their units ar not really lifetime at all. I actually like that I am replace these filters for fresh ones. The filter price is reasonable, so that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Just one wish...
customer_reviews.text: This unit serves its purpose, but buying the filter replacements is a bummer. They are costly and have to be changed frequently. That's a definite minus. On the flip side frequent replacement means its working exactly as intended and for the reason I bought it. Wish the filters were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: D Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an old dorm at my university and have been getting sick constantly due to the levels of dust, mold, and pollen - this air purifier saved my life! After buying this, I have no longer gotten sick because of my allergies :) It has different levels of intensity so if you don't like the noise, just turn it down - it has never bothered me.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. I checked the filter after 3 months—it was clean. Meanwhile, there’s dust all over my room. Waste of money, I’m pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It makes the room a bit less dusty, it's pretty quiet on low setting, but don't expect great performances. It's a budget air filter, and as such it works decently
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: Vaping in the House? This helps circulate the air
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research to decide what air purifier to get that wouldn't break the bank. This thing works like a charm. Works best in one room at a time - we move it if we decide to vape in the living room versus the bedroom. Pros: light weight, quiet, all 3 speeds work accordingly, good for E-cigarette/Vape vapor circulation, helps with musty odors. Con: no idea what the orange light does, not sure where to get filters (I'll cross that bridge when I get there).
customer_reviews.author: Anele

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Holmes small room air Purifier - 1 each for 3 different rooms. They definitely make a difference in air quality and the replacement filters are inexpensive. My house doesn't have central air conditioning and needed this for air circulation and filtration. I am very happy with the product and the quick arrival. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seemed to help with Sinus allergies But..
customer_reviews.text: it gets louder and louder over time on the low setting,and a cold breeze form it.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Soothing sound and works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's as loud as a normal fan. The original filter with it was ok and did a decent job but when you replace it go to the hardware store and find a filter with a better rating to replace the old one. I have noticed my wife and I sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Its a Holmes
customer_reviews.text: Holmes makes fans, and that I what attracted me to this little filter. It is moderately quiet and the sound it does make is acceptable as background noise, and quite tolerable for sleeping. Small footprint. Great for an office or small bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: zeebater

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a couple of weeks now and I love it. I keep it in the bedroom on the lowest setting 24/7 which is pretty quiet and my sleep quality has improved so much. And it definitely grabs the dust too. Considering buying another one for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty good I work in an office that is open and have some interesting smells coming from my coworkers. This works pretty good and it's not that noisy
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Small and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a winner here folks. Got to reduce dust in my computer room and its killing it. In only one day of running took dust count down to half easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jubran

customer_reviews.title: Buy the true HEPA filter for the real thing.
customer_reviews.text: It's fine, but not actual HEPA as sold. "Hepa Type" is just hype, not the real thing. Still, you can buy the actual HEPA filter replacement "Holmes AER1 True HEPA Performance Plus Filter, HAPF300AP-U4". It almost doubles the cost, but then you have the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mostafitty

customer_reviews.title: This little dynamo is doing a great job! I'm used to the expensive air filters
customer_reviews.text: This little dynamo is doing a great job! I'm used to the expensive air filters......took a chance on this one for our RV...and I can't believe how well it works. Even took it into a small beach house that smelled musty when we arrived. By the next day...it was cleared out and very comfortable. Will take it everywhere we go. Why not? It's very portable in size.
customer_reviews.author: AmmaClarke

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for cigarette odor. Very loud on high speed
customer_reviews.text: This product was okay; didn't help much with cigarette smoke odor but did help freshen up the room a bit. It is very loud on high speed.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: A great air purifier for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Holmes Small Room 3-Speed HEPA-Type Air Purifier with Optional Ionizer for about 10 years, & loved it! I got a new one because I now live in an RV & need another one. The amount of mold & dust it filters out is amazing, & it's been great. I would recommend a dehumidifier to go along with if you're living in an RV over the winter.
customer_reviews.author: pjc

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this in a 20X12 utility building at our home and I keep it air and heated, This keeps the air clean, This one replaced the other one like this that we used for about 20 years
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Small and effective
customer_reviews.text: This product has a small footprint and is great for the small room I put it in. So far it seems like a great purchase. I'm not sure about the durability or easy to clean yet since I haven't had it long enough but I think it's going to be a great addition to our family life. I will be buying another one for another room. The price was good for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia H.

customer_reviews.title: This has been great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s dorm room freshman year. He has allergies and was moving to a warm, moist climate. We have vacationed there before and he had allergy symptoms. After using this, he very seldom felt the need to take any allergy medicine and did not seem to have symptoms there. He usually wakes up with a stuffy nose and sneezing without it. The dorm is very old and with four boys in a small area, we feel that this has been a great product to improve his air quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Baker

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the air smelling good.,
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep the dust out of the air , plus it doesn’t occupy a large space.
customer_reviews.author: Julian B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office and bedroom
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 of these since we were dealing with bad air quality due to local wild fires. These really do the trick and make the air so much better! They are a nice size for our office and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not trilled with the instructions provided. Instruct to go ...
customer_reviews.text: Not trilled with the instructions provided. Instruct to go on their website to register for reminders filter changes but when one goes to the website there nothing indicating how to register or if you register there is no option to register for such reminder. Also cleaning instructions are poor
customer_reviews.author: Matifa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This air filter, while a tad noisy at full go, is perfect for keeping dog hair, pollen and dust to a minimum in my home office. I've been very impressed by the reduction in the accumulation of the aforementioned pollutants on my desk and nearby electronics and can say that the unit exceeded my expectations given its reasonable price point. Speaking of which...the replacement filters, both carbon and HEPA are just as reasonably priced...making this unit a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Andreae

customer_reviews.title: just got one
customer_reviews.text: I just got one and was pleasantly surprised by the size, since there is no dimensions in the description, I thought it is small, but in reality it is approx 12" X 13" X 5"(dont have it in front of me), so it is kinda commercial)) which is even better, and, yes, powerful and cleans really good, smells also nice, on a smallest speed very quiet, on a highest not so much, but, look , for that price I really dont mind, knock on wood)
customer_reviews.author: NataNYC

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lot of dust out of the air!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Pretty quiet. Has ozone setting that we don't use. Circulates air nicely in our forward cabin also have one in our main cabin. They gather in a lot of dust and are easy to clean. I have been running them 24/7 for months and they are not showing any signs of stress. No mustiness remains, nor are there any dust particles visible in the air. I am very pleased with these units.
customer_reviews.author: Nancie Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan. I have problems with mold in a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. I have problems with mold in a bedroom and needed something to push the air around so that it wouldn't just stay stagnant. The lowest setting is pretty quiet and is used while we are sleeping. My only complaint is that the air flow comes out from only the lower part of the grate, so it isn't strong airflow coming from the unit.
customer_reviews.author: MVTTC4393

customer_reviews.title: So nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during the wildfires in the WA area, completely took away my smoke headaches. This was a lifesaver with how crappy our air quality was. Very much reccommend, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jess F

customer_reviews.title: We like it so well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. We bought it to help with sinus/allergy issues my husband & I have both been experiencing in our apartment. We run it in the living room & sometimes move it into the bedroom in the evenings. It's helped tremendously. We like it so well, we're planning to move this one to our bedroom permanently & buy a larger Holmes purifier for the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great price and works/looks exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great price and works/looks exactly as described. I have this on my desk at work and can definitely tell a difference in the air when this is on. I keep it on low and it does make some noise, but it is right by my phone and I don't have any problems. I will probably buy a second one for my bedroom soon.
customer_reviews.author: MWine

customer_reviews.title: The filter is easy to take out and clean off and put back ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these- one for my room and one for my daughters. My daughter was going to bed sneezing and coughing and I was waking up that way so I thought I'd give it a try. Neither of us have this problem anymore ever since I bought these. The filter is easy to take out and clean off and put back in. I keep both of them running most of the time and I do not have a huge dust problem... I'm sure I should look into buying new filters soon but I've had them 2 months or so and they're still doing great! I recommend these for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Renae

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a machine from 1990 because of the color
customer_reviews.text: This isnt the prettiest looking air purifier, but was the only one that wasn't tall. I bought it for the livingroom. Needed one that wouldn't block the line of sight while watching tv. Just wished it looked prettier.
customer_reviews.author: Pangnhia Chang

customer_reviews.title: Too Noisy to Live With!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to works well but is impossibly noisy even on the lowest setting. I set it out with the trash after three days.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use this in the pets room
customer_reviews.text: I have this running in the pets room for some background noise to keep them from barking at every sound. Also we have bad allergies so trying to get this to help with that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Randall W

customer_reviews.title: This filter is a life saver and made me able ...
customer_reviews.text: This filter is a life saver and made me able to keep my dog and breath at the same time. I use a Holmes AER1 True HEPA Performance Plus Filter on mine. This way I get True Hepa filtering.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: This unit sits in my bedroom and runs at high speed (because I like the sound of a fan at night)
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I was skeptical about buying this, but HOLY COW what a difference this has made in my life! This unit sits in my bedroom and runs at high speed (because I like the sound of a fan at night), and the first morning after this had been running all night I woke up with NO coughing, chest congestion or anything. Plus I have been feeling great every morning! SO glad I purchased this and I will definitely buy another one soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a sleep noise maker!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for a sleeping noise maker. Not sure about the odor elimination, I don't seem to notice anything, I only use it at night. Filter looks easy to change.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little purifier.
customer_reviews.text: So my roommate got a kitten, and I'm allergic to cats. Putting this in my room helped immensely with my allergies. I never have to put it above the lowest setting and I have it going all the time in my large-ish bedroom. Perfect for a bedroom or small living room. You can hear it but it's quieter than a fan and you don't even hear it after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cat friendly product! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of this item, does wonders to clean air near litter boxes! Excellent value and filters are very reasonable. The low speed is very quiet and does not disturb anyone day or night. Great value and shipped fast! Ty!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after an hour
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got stopped working after an hour. Both amazon and the holmes customer service was very friendly when it came to getting a new one however, even that one broke after only 3 days. No sounds, no burning smell, they both just stopped working. It was a waste of my shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great air purifier!
customer_reviews.text: The Holmes air purifier works great! After reading some of the reviews about the noise level, I was slightly concerned that it would too loud for my therapy office. I used the air purifier today and the noise level was fine. I can barely hear it when it is on the lowest level. When it is on the highest level, it might be distracting to some people but I could easily carry on a conversation. This air purifier seems to be quieter than the Germ Guardian I have at home.
customer_reviews.author: N. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sent back , Found it for a more reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Worked Great . But I knew it would . Just found one for a better price .
customer_reviews.author: Wirewend

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value--long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Holmes air freshener, to use in our third room--it's a necessity with teenagers. Can't believe the great job it does with odor elimination--small, disappears into the background, quiet. Really like the fact that they're not making them in black--great color. We have one that's been in almost constant use for 7 years--this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaLeis Dibert

customer_reviews.title: Works great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Works great out of the box. I use it in my bird room in which I have many parakeets and it is easily able to keep dust from them from building up completely. The only issue that makes this filter less than preferable in my specific scenario is that the amount of dust my birds put out means that the filters only last around one month. Seeing as the cheapest filter is about 10$ each, it can become a bit pricey to maintain. I would rather have a filter that was reusable even if it meant diminished performance.
customer_reviews.author: Lyra

customer_reviews.title: True to description.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my bedroom and I can tell a difference in the air quality minutes after turning it on. My room is in the basement so it tends to get a little stuffy down there and this filter helps a lot. I only need to use it for short periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: I have been extremely satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughters room. I have been extremely satisfied with this product. The fan is just enough white noise for her to sleep at night on the high setting. During the day we put it on the low setting. We have had it on constantly for about 2 months now and it is still working great. I have not had to purchase a new filter yet so TBD how that will go. The description says that it will stand up horizontally or vertically but the sides are rounded so I do not think that it would work well standing up on one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it actually does anything.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure it actually does much of anything. I'm an allergy sufferer so I purchased this to put next to my bed. It's been well over four months and I don't see a difference in air quality. Also, it's quite noisy for such a little thing. But that's ok, I use it for white noise when I'm sleeping. Overall, I would not purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nunyo

customer_reviews.title: we don't have the best air quality
customer_reviews.text: Living in LA, we don't have the best air quality. I like to turn it on during the afternoon when the air gets even more polluted with the heavy traffic. I think it's a great product. I have not been able to scientifically test whether my air quality in my room is better but the room feels fresh when I turn it on for a while. I will update the review once I replace the filter and see how much stuff got filtered. The only complaint that I have is that it is a bit noisy but given that I hear choppers, ambulance sirens, and honking constantly, it's not a big deal. Great product overall :D
customer_reviews.author: P. Kim

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if it helps at all b/c my allergies are so bad. I still operate often
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't know if it helps at all b/c my allergies are so bad. I still operate often. Not sure how well it works b/c it is supposed to suck/intake the bad air through the top, but it blows/exhausts through the front. I feel like any air getting near it is getting blown-away. It's better than nothing...I don't know how any other machine works. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W. Parrett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ✨
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I made this purchase. I live in a smoking, college roommates, and cats household and my allergies were driving me crazy. I plugged this thing in and immediately smelled a difference in the air. I would like to know how long the air filter lasts? I should probably read the box lol
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Mena

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet smells
customer_reviews.text: Great product to get rid of that nasty pet smell. I was tired of that litter box and hay smell from my 2 bunnies and cat. This does a great job at cutting the oder and the air does feel a little cleaner. Only con is the noise and the fact that it's cold where i live and this thing acts like a fan. It would be great for those hot summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Evey

customer_reviews.title: Holmes Type, 3 Speeds Desktop Air Purifier ...
customer_reviews.text: we had smoke in the house from all the forest fires. it cleans the air with in the hour, and makes the house smell clean and fresh ... the best ever ...
customer_reviews.author: Marie Toss

customer_reviews.title: Can sleep without it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace a much older one i had. Was heartbroken when the last one broke. Found this slightly updated version and im very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT and use to prevent chronic pain and for white noise for insomnia!
customer_reviews.text: Great air purifier We have a few around the apartment and have significantly reduced allergies as well as even chronic back and hip pain (REALLY!) In fact, I know when the filter needs cleaning/replacing because my back aches and knees crack. I'm also a very light sleeper/insomniac, and keep one right next to my head on the bedstand to create a "white noise" effect, blocking out outside noises -- I can't understate how dramatic the effect on my sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Holmes Small Room 3-Speed HEPA Air Purifier with Optional Ionizer, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteClear the air with the compact Holmes HEPA-type Air Purifier for purer air for you and your family. Operates quietly to help remove common household odors and up to 99% of airborne particle such as pollen, dust, mold, pet dander, and smoke, providing relief from irritants in the air. HEPA-type filter captures particles as small as 2 microns so you can breathe comfortably. Includes one Aer1 filter featuring the odor-eliminating power of baking soda.
feature_bullets: HEPA-TYPE FILTRATION: Filter helps remove up to 99% of dust, smoke, pollen, odors, mold spores, and pet dander, filtering particles as small as 2 microns to help provide cleaner air for your home or office; includes one Aer1 filter and uses any Holmes Aer1 Series Filter including Total Air, Allergen Remover, Odor Eliminator, and Smoke Grabber

CONVENIENT FEATURES: Choose from 3 cleaning speeds to keep air fresh and pure: Select a lower speed while you're home for continued purification with less ambient noise and a higher speed for powerful air purification while you're out

DUAL POSITIONING AND COMPACT DESIGN: This compact air purifier can be placed vertically or horizontally anywhere, including a table or desktop; it's recommended for rooms up to 109 square feet or 10' x 11'
OPTIONAL IONIZER: The optional ionizer naturally improves the performance of the air purifier while freshening the air. Watts: 49.5
3-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: This product comes with a 3-year limited warranty from Holmes
HEPA type filter helps remove up to 99% of airborne particles as small as 2 microns from the air passing through it
3 speed settings provide options for different conditions, and optional ionizer assists in particle removal
Slim dual positioning design can be placed vertically or horizontally to best fit your space
Recommended for rooms up to 109 sq ft (10ft x 11ft), Smoke CADR 70
Any Holmes AER1 Series HAPF30AT, HAPF30AO, HAPF30AH, HAPF300AP Filters or Holmes HAPF30D-U2 HEPA TYPE or Holmes HAPF300D-U2 TRUE HEPA Filter & a Holmes Arm and Hammer Carbon Filter AOR31

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,066 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
